vendors.name: Frank the Hotdog Vendor
vendors.description: A classic hotdog vendor with a heart of gold and a voice that carries across three sections

dialogue.text: Get your hot dogs here! Fresh and delicious!
That wave looks great, folks! Keep it up!
Hot dogs! The perfect game snack!
What a wave! That's the spirit!
Step right up for the best dogs in the stadium!
Don't forget to hydrate after those hot dogs!
That's how you do it! Beautiful wave!
Classic dogs for a classic crowd!

vendors.name: Rita the Refreshment Queen
vendors.description: Bubbly personality matching her fizzy beverages

dialogue.text: Ice cold drinks! Beat the heat!
Refreshments here! Stay hydrated!
That wave was refreshing!
Quench your thirst with the best!
Don't let that thirst slow you down!
Fizzy drinks for a fizzy crowd!
Pop some bottles, pop some waves!
You're all bubbling with excitement!

vendors.name: Vinnie the Crunch Calzone
vendors.description: Grizzled veteran vendor who has seen every stadium wave since PAC-MAN

dialogue.text: Pretzels hotter than a CRT!
Eat up, before the wave eats you!
Another wave, another crumb...
Don't spill on the joystick, kid!
Old school flavor, fresh batch!
I survived the flood. You?
Snack attack, coming atcha!
Still got it. Wave's got nothing on me!

vendors.name: Dotty Merch
vendors.description: Hyper-enthusiastic rookie who speaks like a 1980s toy commercial

traits.name: Rookie
traits.description: New to the game but eager to please

dialogue.text: Power up with a foam finger!
Shirt sale—get 'em while they zap!
Wicked! You wave like a boss!
Cap or tee—level up your look!
Merch boost! Style unlocked!
Epic wave! You're high score material!
Flash sale—don't glitch!
You rock the stands, superstar!

vendors.name: Spike Rad Johnson
vendors.description: Laid-back cool skater vendor with 80s slang and chill vibes

dialogue.text: Snax and swag: gnarly combo, bro!
Grab a bite, score a toy—radness guaranteed!
Whoa, wave was major turbo!
Totally munchable!
Merch in motion—surf the style!
You're cruising the top score zone!
Snack up, chill out!
Wave-slayer, you!

mascots.name: Thunder the Stadium Bird
mascots.description: A majestic bird mascot who soars above the crowd, inspiring waves of excitement

dialogue.text: *SCREECH* Let's see that wave reach the sky!
Magnificent! The crowd soars with me!
Spread your wings, fans! Let's fly!
The stadium thunders with your power!
Rise above! Show them your spirit!
Together we soar! Never give up!

abilities.name: Sky Rally
abilities.description: Flies above the crowd, boosting attention across all sections

mascots.name: Slam Dunk Duck
mascots.description: Energetic sporty mallard with basketball skills straight from a late-80s arcade

traits.name: Clumsy
traits.description: Sometimes trips but always recovers with style

dialogue.text: Let's get quacking! Flap those wings, fans!
Slam dunk, team! That wave hit the high score!
C'mon, don't be a lame duck—smile and wave!
Put your feathers into it! We need lift-off!
Quack Attack incoming! Time for some splashy moves!
Duck yeah! Fans fly together!
Whoa! That's a full court wave!

abilities.name: Quack Attack
abilities.description: Splashes water and boosts wave energy with basketball slam moves

mascots.name: Pixel Panther
mascots.description: Neon-glow panther inspired by 80s arcades and sports car culture with mysterious cool style

dialogue.text: Lights out, neon on—let's see some energy!
Now THAT'S a wave—pure panther power!
Yo, eyes on the prize. Panther's in the house!
Stay hydrated, wildcats—I don't wanna see you fade!
Panther Pulse! Get ready to groove!
Wave smooth, wave cool, wave wild!
Is that all you got? I wanna see the pulse!

abilities.name: Panther Pulse
abilities.description: Neon glow mesmerizes crowd and boosts all stats

announcers.name: Classic Jim
announcers.description: The voice of tradition - a seasoned announcer with decades of experience

traits.name: Knowledgeable
traits.description: Deep understanding of the game and crowd dynamics

commentary.text: Ladies and gentlemen, here comes another wave!
Beautiful execution by section A! The wave continues!
Oh, section B couldn't keep it going. Let's try again!
Welcome to the stadium! Get ready for an exciting session!
Fantastic performance! The crowd is absolutely electric today!
And the wave completes its journey! Magnificent!
The crowd seems a bit tired. Let's get that energy back!

catchphrases.text: AND THE WAVE IS PERFECT! All three sections in perfect harmony!
Five in a row! This crowd is unstoppable!

announcers.name: Energetic Zoey
announcers.description: A high-energy announcer who brings NBA Jam-style excitement to every moment

traits.name: Maximum Enthusiasm
traits.description: Energy levels off the charts at all times

commentary.text: BOOM! HERE WE GO! WAVE TIME!
YES! YES! YES! Keep it rolling!
Aww, so close! But we're not giving up!
TOUCHDOWN! THAT WAVE WAS PERFECT!
LET'S GET THIS PARTY STARTED! ARE YOU READY?!
OFF THE CHARTS! YOU'RE BREAKING RECORDS!
Come on, crowd! Let's pump up that energy!

catchphrases.text: THE CROWD IS ON FIRE! BOOM-SHAKALAKA!

announcers.name: Sarcastic Sam
announcers.description: Dry wit and deadpan delivery with subtle sarcasm

commentary.text: Wow, another wave. Riveting—who could've guessed?
Hold onto your hats, it's yet ANOTHER wave start.
Impressive start—assuming we call any start 'impressive'.
And there it goes. Surprise level: zero.
Another session begins. Try to contain your excitement.
Well, well. Someone's actually trying today.
And the wave completes. Shocking development.
The crowd is awake! Or just not asleep yet.

catchphrases.text: Perfect wave. Someone write this down for the history books. Or don't.

announcers.name: Professional Patricia
announcers.description: Precise, measured, and highly professional sports broadcaster

commentary.text: Attention fans, the wave sequence is commencing—prepare your sections.
Wave initiation announced—please synchronize your participation.
Excellent execution by that section. Wave continues as expected.
Section participation below optimal levels. Wave interrupted.
Stadium session commencing. All participants, please be ready.
Outstanding performance metrics achieved. Crowd excellence confirmed.
Wave sequence completed successfully. Well done, all sections.
Attention levels require improvement. Please increase engagement.

catchphrases.text: Flawless wave execution across all sections. Textbook performance.

announcers.name: Casual Carl
announcers.description: Laid-back friendly commentator who makes everyone feel comfortable

commentary.text: Alright folks, here comes the wave—get ready to chill!
Wave time! Everybody, just go with it.
Nice one! Keep it rolling, friends.
Ah well, can't win 'em all. Let's try again!
Hey everyone, welcome! Let's have some fun out there.
Wow, you guys are killing it! Keep up the awesome work!
Nice! That wave made it all the way through!
Hey, no worries—just having fun is what matters!
Here comes another one! Let's make it count!
Beautiful! That section nailed it!

catchphrases.text: Dude! That wave was absolutely perfect! High fives all around!

crowdChatter.text: Rad move, mascot! Do the worm!
This game's maxed out on fun!
Hit us with another turbo wave!
All your base are belong to us!
Woot! Extra life for that snack!
Gimme a high five, Mario style!
Ride the glitch, ride the wave!
Up, down, up—insert coin for epic wave!
Wave so wild it's breaking my screen!
Get your sprite moving, next row!
This wave's so hot, it needs a cooldown!
Keep it moving, like a scrolling background!
Bring on the snacks, not the lag!
Is the wave stuck in a bug loop?
We need cheat codes for faster hotdogs!
I'd trade all my gold rings for nachos!
Vendor, you're camping my spawn point!
I need a soda refill, stat!
Vendor's speed is lower than NES!
Looks like my drink is Game Over.
Dude, save a hotdog for Player 2!
AFK until the next wave starts!
Which level is this? Feels like filler!
Game devs, patch this wave lag!
The real boss fight: getting a soda!
Wish real life had unlimited lives!
This crowd could use a power-up.
Is this wave DLC? Feels add-on!
Wake up, crowd—this isn't demo mode!
Mascot's got some Donkey Kong jumps!
Mascot, bring me some coin drops!
That mascot's the ultimate cheat code!
Who unlocked hard mode on this wave?
Is this the Konami code for fun?
My popcorn's stuck in a glitch!
Put a quarter in and start the wave!
Mascot's doing a Mega Man slide!
Wave's got more bounce than Sonic!
Wave so loud it's breaking the game!
Boo-yah! That wave was a combo hit!
Crank it up to warp zone speed!
Hyper jump on this next wave!
Mascot's dancing like he's stuck in a cutscene!
Wave so strong, it needs a memory upgrade!
We're in the bonus round of cheers!
Only in 8-bit can my dad do the wave!
